segments.text: Welcome to IBA . Do you need any assistance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . I'm hoping to get a mortgage from you and was wondering about your interest rates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . We offer Personal Housing Loans , or mortgages , at a rate of 0.42 % per month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's pretty much the same as I've been quoted at other banks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We offer many different payment plans . Would you be looking at long-term or short-term ? Are you looking at a 10 - year repayment plan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Definitely . I want to get my mortgage paid off as soon as I can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then we can certainly help you with that . You see , for shorter term loans , we can offer an even more competitive interest rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmmm ... that does sound interesting . Is there anyone available I can talk with about this in more detail ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll get our Mortgage Adviser for you . Please take a seat , I won't be a minute .
segments.speaker: S1
